title: Mobile Device Forensics
description: An analyst must conduct a forensic analysis of a captured enemy combatant's smartphone to extract intelligence.

tasks.description: Use specialized tools to bypass the phone's password and create a forensic image of its internal memory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully gains access to the phone's data.

tasks.description: Extract and analyze call logs, text messages, photos, and location history from the image.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst extracts all relevant data from the phone.

tasks.description: Generate an intelligence report based on the extracted data, identifying other enemy combatants, locations, and plans.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst produces a valuable intelligence product from the forensic analysis.
